page.title: 03Games We Play.
page.content: There are lots of{games}that are very {old,}and children still play them now, but with{new}names. We like to play {Bulldogs, Stag, Bottle of Poison,Stuck {-in-the-Mud,}which are all games that our teacher used to play, but with different names. We usually play these games in the{playground}or on the school field, because lots of children join in and they involve running and catching people. I like Bulldogs because you can have a rest at one side when you are tired. I also like dodging people. On the{field}we play{cricket, {rounders and football.}My favourite game is football because you are always on the move, with or without the ball. At{home}I play on my{bike.}If it is raining I play{darts, snooker or pool, or play on my friend's{computer.
